Text:
OH MY GOD, NOT EVERY ONE HAS UNLIMITED DOWNLOAD AND SEEDING SPEED!!!

Would you mind, terribly, breaking this up into, say 1GB parts, so MOST of us have a small chance of getting it all.

Thankx

im sorry but breaking this up wud really make it difficult for me to keep track of all the albums that are there and wud only mess things up for me..

you do have an alternative...

download the torrent in 1 gb parts instead of downloading it all together.. you can refer to this tutorial for assistance

https://forum.suprbay.org/showthread.php?tid=116344&pid=723827#pid723827

thanx.. hope this helps :D
